title: The Return of Sherlock Holmes
fullTitle: The Return of Sherlock Holmes (TV Series 1986â€“1988)

episodes.title: The Empty House
episodes.plot: Believed dead after his fatal encounter with Professor Moriarity three years earlier, Sherlock Holmes returns to England to foil a plot to murder him by a former Moriarity gang member.

episodes.title: The Priory School
episodes.plot: The headmaster of a prestigious prep school calls on Holmes for help when the ten year old only son of powerful but publicity-shy duke disappears.

episodes.title: The Second Stain
episodes.plot: Holmes is asked by the country's Prime Minister to aid in the recovery of a stolen diplomatic letter, which, if published, might lead England into war.

episodes.title: The Musgrave Ritual
episodes.plot: An obscure family document containing an enigmatic ritual holds the key to a hidden treasure if Holmes can decipher the mystery.

episodes.title: The Abbey Grange
episodes.plot: Holmes is called to a manor house to investigate the brutal murder of a country lord with a fireplace poker and reconcile the story of his bruised and battered wife with the facts.

episodes.title: The Man with the Twisted Lip
episodes.plot: Responding to a grieving wife, Holmes investigates the apparent murder of her husband in an apartment above an opium den.

episodes.title: The Six Napoleons
episodes.plot: Inspector Lastrade reveals to Holmes that someone has been inexplicably breaking into homes for the senseless purpose of breaking small busts of Napoleon.

episodes.title: The Sign of Four
episodes.plot: Mary Morstan has received a pearl in the post every year since her father's disappearance; this leads Holmes and Watson to the truth about a secret pact between four convicts during the Indian Mutiny of 1857.
